getAtoms

public static java.util.Collection<Formula> getAtoms()
Returns the set of atoms, i.e., formulae corresponding to BDD variables, that were registered so far. The order of iteration corresponds to the BDD variable ordering.

Returns:
A set of formulae.

addAtom

public static boolean addAtom(Formula f)
Registers this formula as a BDD variable. If this formula is a Boolean combination of simpler formulae they all get registered in some order. This method can be used to control the ordering of BDD variables by registering predicate formulae in the desired order.

Returns:
true if new atoms were added.

toFormula

public Formula toFormula()
Converts the internal BDD in this object to a formula using an if-then-else style.

Returns:
An FOTC formula.

toDNFFormula

public Formula toDNFFormula()
Converts the internal BDD in this object to a DNF formula or 0, if the formula is false.

Returns:
An FOTC formula.

getAtoms

protected static Formula[] getAtoms(Formula f)
Returns an array of sub-formulae that are Boolean operations (and/or/not).

Parameters:
f - A formula.
Returns:
An array of formula that do not correspond to Boolean operations.
